alert.note: Alert for Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:43AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN LA PORTE COUNTY THROUGH 515 AM CDT... At 443 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Porte, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 54. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte
